import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import'./i18n';// Initialize i18n
import{generateLazyRoutes}from'./utils/lazyRouteUtils';import logger from'./utils/logger';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const appLogger=logger.getLogger('App');// Get basename from PUBLIC_URL or default to /sgex
const basename=process.env.PUBLIC_URL||'/sgex';React.useEffect(()=>{appLogger.componentMount();appLogger.info('SGEX Branch Listing application started',{environment:process.env.NODE_ENV,basename:basename});return()=>{appLogger.componentUnmount();};},[appLogger,basename]);// Generate all routes dynamically using lazy loading
const routes=generateLazyRoutes();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{basename:basename,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:routes})})});}export default App;
